content.name: Mod Support APIs Community Edition
content.description: Community Version of MIT licensed SirNuke's collection of APIs for modding support. Components include: Lua Loader API, Time API, Named Pipes API, Hotkey API, Interact Menu API, Simple Menu API. 2025-05 Source for X4 7.5: https://github.com/Chryssie/x4-projects/tree/master/extensions/sn_mod_support_apis
content.author: SirNukes, bvbohnen, Chryssie, iomatix, and others
